metadata.title: How can I program the device in production?

sections.content:
Question:
How can I program the device in production?
Answer:
The device has a serial programming interface that can be used to store any application parameters (related to the specific motor, or any other configurable settings) into the device memory.
Suitable Products
RISC-V ASSP
